Package com.cdd.lab5

Class LeaderFollowerQueue

java.lang.Object
com.cdd.lab5.LeaderFollowerQueue
public class LeaderFollowerQueue extends Object
This class contains all the variables required to synchronise the Leader and Follower classes such that they execute in pairs.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    Semaphore
    followerQ
    A semaphore acting as a queue for the follower threads.
    int
    followers
    Keeps track of number of follower threads waiting to "dance."
    Semaphore
    leaderQ
    A semaphore acting as a queue for the leader threads.
    int
    leaders
    Keeps track of number of leader threads waiting to "dance."
    Semaphore
    mutex
    A semaphore used as a mutex lock to control access to the leaders/followers variables.
    Semaphore
    rendezvous
    A semaphore used to confirm that a pair of threads are finished "dancing."

    LeaderFollowerQueue()

  • Field Details

    • leaders

      public int leaders
      Keeps track of number of leader threads waiting to "dance."

    • followers

      public int followers
      Keeps track of number of follower threads waiting to "dance."

    • mutex

      public Semaphore mutex
      A semaphore used as a mutex lock to control access to the leaders/followers variables.

    • leaderQ

      public Semaphore leaderQ
      A semaphore acting as a queue for the leader threads.

    • followerQ

      public Semaphore followerQ
      A semaphore acting as a queue for the follower threads.

    • rendezvous

      public Semaphore rendezvous
      A semaphore used to confirm that a pair of threads are finished "dancing."

  • Constructor Details

    • LeaderFollowerQueue

      LeaderFollowerQueue()
      Simple constructor method. leaderQ and followerQ are both initialised to 0 so it will not be possible to signal unless a thread is waiting.
